item.title: CVE-2024-32958|2024-08-02T02:27:52.990Z -- giorgos%20sarigiannidis -- slash%20admin
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Giorgos Sarigiannidis Slash Admin allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Slash Admin: from n/a through 3.8.1.
